text: allah (marumai nalil isavai nokki), ‘‘maryamutaiya makan isave! Allahvutan ennaiyum, en tayaiyum iru katavulkalaka etuttuk kollunkal enru manitarkalai nokki nir kurinira?'' Enru ketpan enpataiyum napakamuttuviraka. Atarku avar kuruvar: ‘‘Ni mikap paricuttamanavan. Enakku oru ciritum takatatai nan orupotum kuramatten. Avvaru nan kuriyiruntal niccayamaka ni atai arintiruppaye! En ullattilullatai ni nankarivay. Un ullattilullatai nan ariyamatten. Niccayamaka nitan maraivanavai anaittaiyum nankaripavan
